price: 138. Telle est l’empreinte d’Allah ! Mais qui donc saurait donner à la religion meilleure empreinte qu’Allah ? C’est de Lui que nous sommes adorateurs.
arabic: صِبۡغَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ صِبۡغَةٗۖ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُۥ عَٰبِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ṣib'ghata al-lahi waman aḥsanu mina al-lahi ṣib'ghatan wanaḥnu lahu ʿābidūna
